availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary F. Wise Pugh. Married to Catherine Jones Pugh in 1854. Father of Jane N. Pugh, Sarah E. Pugh, George R. Pugh, Margaret Francis. Pugh, Lucy E. Pugh, Mary L. Pugh, Susan E. Pugh, and Capitola Pugh. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Spencer County, District 1, p. 83A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Milburn District, p. 81.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Milburn District 7, p. 7.
